arguments.title: Executive Summary
bullets: No imminent summit between Putin and Zelensky despite Trump's push.
Trump acknowledges the complexity of the Ukraine conflict.
Putin suggested Zelensky visit Moscow; Ukraine unlikely to accept.
US and European leaders emphasize security guarantees for Ukraine.
Permanent peace deal considered, but ceasefire remains elusive.

arguments.title: Agenda of Recent Diplomatic Activities
items: US President Trump meets Putin and European leaders.
Discussion on possible summit between Putin and Zelensky.
Admiral Tony Radakin's visit to Washington for military talks.
Putin's proposal for Zelensky to visit Moscow.
Emphasis on security guarantees for Ukraine.

arguments.keyMessage: Achieving a permanent peace deal in Ukraine is challenging but necessary.
supports: Putin and Zelensky's meeting remains uncertain.
Security guarantees are crucial for Ukraine's sovereignty.
US and European leaders are involved in diplomatic talks.

stakeholders.name: Vladimir Putin
stakeholders.notes: Russian President, key figure in conflict resolution.

stakeholders.name: Volodymyr Zelensky
stakeholders.notes: Ukrainian President, advocating for Ukraine's sovereignty.

stakeholders.name: Admiral Tony Radakin
stakeholders.notes: UK's military chief, involved in military discussions.
